questions.explanation: cosec ⁡ A = a b ⇒ cosec ⁡ 2 A = a 2 b 2 [ বর্গকরে ] ⇒ 1 + cot ⁡ 2 A = a 2 b 2 ⇒ cot ⁡ 2 A = a 2 b 2 − 1 ⇒ cot ⁡ 2 A = a 2 − b 2 b 2 ⇒ cot ⁡ A = a 2 − b 2 b ⇒ 1 tan ⁡ A = a 2 − b 2 b ∴ tan ⁡ A = b a 2 − b 2 \begin{aligned} & \operatorname{cosec} A=\frac{a}{b} \\ \Rightarrow & \operatorname{cosec}^{2} A=\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}} \quad[ বর্গ করে] \\ \Rightarrow & 1+\cot ^{2} A=\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}} \\ \Rightarrow & \cot ^{2} A=\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}-1 \\ \Rightarrow & \cot ^{2} A=\frac{a^{2}-b^{2}}{b^{2}} \\ \Rightarrow & \cot A=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}{b} \\ \Rightarrow & \frac{1}{\tan A}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}{b} \\ \therefore & \tan A=\frac{b}{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}\end{aligned} ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ ⇒ ∴ ​ cosec A = b a ​ cosec 2 A = b 2 a 2 ​ [ বর্গকরে ] 1 + cot 2 A = b 2 a 2 ​ cot 2 A = b 2 a 2 ​ − 1 cot 2 A = b 2 a 2 − b 2 ​ cot A = b a 2 − b 2 ​ ​ tan A 1 ​ = b a 2 − b 2 ​ ​ tan A = a 2 − b 2 ​ b ​ ​
